0e92a82e7917f9374acd29a75341192154017e3d.query:
SELECT ROUND(CAST(COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0.00) as numeric), 2) AS "amount!" FROM rating r
INNER JOIN chat_user cu ON cu.chat_user_id = r.chat_user_id
INNER JOIN "user" u ON u.user_id = cu.user_id
WHERE u.telegram_id = $1 AND cu.chat_id = $2;

412ce8e6785ae763aec6e9ca6763d8a4a07eaaff.query:
INSERT INTO chat(chat_id, title)
VALUES ($1, $2)
ON CONFLICT (chat_id) DO UPDATE
SET title = $2
WHERE chat.title != $2;

4b6b32f9cfaac270fa3a332f9639feca3155821d.query: SELECT u.user_id FROM "user" u WHERE u.telegram_id = $1;

4b729a80b085c63e1a4ded6adaf5d6901b105213.query: UPDATE chat SET chat_id = $2 WHERE chat.chat_id = $1;

7331d6c342bd199c10c7c1d68efc36fb4d528f05.query: INSERT INTO chat_user(user_id, chat_id) VALUES ($1, $2) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

8c3415453e9ca1032d882a970776afc48f079a78.query:
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS "full_name!", COALESCE(SUM(r.amount), 0.00) AS "rating_amount!"
FROM rating r
INNER JOIN chat_user cu ON cu.chat_user_id = r.chat_user_id
INNER JOIN "user" u ON u.user_id = cu.user_id
WHERE cu.chat_id = $1
GROUP BY u.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name
ORDER BY "rating_amount!" DESC
LIMIT $2;

9469c366cea1fa554dee83851dfc22184291bd8a.query:
INSERT INTO rating(chat_user_id, by_chat_user_id, amount, comment)
VALUES (
        (SELECT cu.chat_user_id FROM chat_user cu INNER JOIN "user" u on u.user_id = cu.user_id WHERE u.telegram_id = $1 AND cu.chat_id = $3),
        (SELECT cu.chat_user_id FROM chat_user cu INNER JOIN "user" u on u.user_id = cu.user_id WHERE u.telegram_id = $2 AND cu.chat_id = $3),
        $4,
        $5
) RETURNING rating_id;

a65b0d11ac3e60a5e949c6492223bcf60cc87c90.query: INSERT INTO chat_settings(chat_id, is_rating_count) VALUES ($1, $2) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;

b6eea4ba1c0034b6f837fd34f5beff5fe14c3b7f.query:
INSERT INTO "user"(telegram_id, username, first_name, last_name)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
ON CONFLICT (telegram_id)
DO UPDATE
SET username = $2, first_name = $3, last_name = $4
WHERE "user".username != $2 OR "user".first_name != $3 OR "user".last_name != $4;

bcf74a12ce0def42c87102c1f8607a92286fe423.query: UPDATE chat_settings SET is_rating_count = $2 WHERE chat_settings.chat_id = $1
